title: Flo Rida Performs 'My House' on 'Flo Rida: Live From Austin': Exclusive
text:
Flo Rida Performs 'My House' on 'Flo Rida: Live From Austin': Exclusive
It's Friday! So why not watch Flo Rida perform his Billboard Hot 100 hit "My House" exclusively on Billboard.com in an excerpt from the concert special FLO RIDA: Live from Austin, which airs tonight (April 29) at 9 p.m. ET on the AT&T Audience Network (DIRECTV Ch 239/U-verse Ch 1114). The rooftop performance and in-depth sit-down interview with the unstoppable hitmaker was filmed live in high-definition 4K at March's SXSW festival in Austin, Texas; he was joined at the show by Gorilla Zoe, Natalie La Rose and Macy Kate.
Heavy Rain Falls, Gary Clark Jr., Elvis Costello and Flor Rida Shine for New Orleans Jazz Fest Day 4
Flo Rida, who has sold well over 100 million singles worldwide, returned to the charts this spring with "My House" from the EP of the same name. Flo already has his next hit cued up with the release of his party-starting weekend track "Hello Friday" with Jason Derulo.
Flo Rida & Jason Derulo Say 'Hello Friday' in New Party Anthem: Listen
Check out the video for the song.
